channel.title: How hot is it for you?
channel.description: I live in new york state the heat index is 110 the actual temp is 102 I have no air conditioning QQ

item.title: How hot is it for you?
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

swimming in 30 degrees? eh, not to bright. lol coldest I swam in is like 60 degrees, right when spring hit an dI was sick for two weeks afterwords

it actually is how I got my first girlfriend,
We didnt have to much in common, so I jumped in the river and from than a great relationship came from it. and plus she was my personal nurse for the two weeks, (well she got me soup and baby talked me lol)

Read full topic
item.source: How hot is it for you?

item.title: How hot is it for you?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:64, topic:405574”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=502567.msg3679613#msg3679613 date=1311449754]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=502567.msg3679609#msg3679609 date=1311449661]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=502567.msg3679539#msg3679539 date=1311446920]
It’s a nice 98 degrees outside and feels only like 105. Very nice weather for the day, There is call for rain again today as well.
[/quote]Damn you Floridians with your high heat tolerance.
[/quote]I have high cold tolerance as well I just deal with the heat or cold, No use to complain over it XD
[/quote]I only have cold tolerance I went to school in shorts once in 40-50 degree weather, compared to needing a pool or air conditioning when its this hot xD[/quote]Last winter when it got down to the 30’s in Florida I was out doing yard work in shorts. Its not that cold, I was even swimming in my pool.

Read full topic
item.source: How hot is it for you?

item.title: How hot is it for you?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

The Wanderer:

It was 115º with the heat index Thursday. It is even worse because of the humidity in the air, I swear. I was out selling discount cards to raise money for my football team, and I started sweating heavily. Just from walking door to door! I just can’t wait for August to roll around with two-a-days…

I know right. Our coach has one early in the morning and then one from 3-5pm. It’s gonna suck

Read full topic
item.source: How hot is it for you?

item.description:

usman555:

How come it’s so hot in your areas? I’m suffering in only 27 degrees.

AL GORE TURNED OFF THE A/C FOR ALL THE NON-BELIEVERS

item.title: How hot is it for you?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:49, topic:405574”]How come it’s so hot in your areas? I’m suffering in only 27 degrees.[/quote]Because when the snow storms came threw over the winter they are just now starting to melt, Then the sun heats up all that water making it steamy, Thus causing the heat to raises and be hotter then normal. Luckily! In Florida it didn’t snow lol, So we are the normal temp for this time of year

Read full topic
